sections.heading: Violations; traffic infraction
sections.text: Unless otherwise declared in the Nebraska Rules of the Road with respect to particular offenses, a violation of any provision of the rules shall constitute a traffic infraction.SourceLaws 1973, LB 45, ยง 102;R.S.1943, (1988), ยง 39-6,102;Laws 1993, LB 370, ยง 178.Cross Re
